content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab (position x=2.5, y=0.5) and inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure you have the required science packs in your inventory before setting research
### Errors when extracting items
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when using inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has the required items to insert before attempting to insert
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when adding items to furnace
-  Ensure the furnace is not full before adding items to it
### Errors when researching technology
-  Ensure you have the required items to research the technology before attempting to research it
